com.bigdata.rdf.rules

Class MappedProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.relation.rule.Program
      • com.bigdata.rdf.rules.MappedProgram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IProgram, IStep, Serializable

    public class MappedProgram
extends Program
    Program automatically maps the rules added across the combination of the database (the relation named on the rule) and the focusStore.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
        name -
        focusStore - Identifies the relation containing the data to be asserted or retracted (optional). When null the steps are not transformed as they are added to the program.
